title: Transaction activity
message:
Money-Wise version 4.2 brings transaction activities.

Now you can add a transaction as a **“credit”** in addition to the existing **“expense”** for a category.

This is useful for keeping track of *refunds or cash back* that have been made to you.

title: Hello
message: This is a **new feature** that allows me to share information about promotions, new feature updates, bug avoidance, and other information directly to you.
